bug.author: helen12138
bug.description: Hi all , sorry to bother you! I can't connect to drive.google! Could you provide some other sites to download pretrained weights pleaseï¼Ÿ

comments.comment:
Hello <denchmark-link:https://github.com/helen12138>@helen12138</denchmark-link> , thank you for your interest in our work! Please visit our <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5/wiki/Train-Custom-Data>Custom Training Tutorial</denchmark-link> to get started, and see our <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5/blob/master/tutorial.ipynb>Jupyter Notebook</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://colab.research.google.com/github/ultralytics/yolov5/blob/master/tutorial.ipynb></denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://hub.docker.com/r/ultralytics/yolov5>Docker Image</denchmark-link> , and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5/wiki/GCP-Quickstart>Google Cloud Quickstart Guide</denchmark-link> for example environments. If this is a bug report, please provide screenshots and minimum viable code to reproduce your issue, otherwise we can not help you. If this is a custom model or data training question, please note that Ultralytics does not provide free personal support. As a leader in vision ML and AI, we do offer professional consulting, from simple expert advice up to delivery of fully customized, end-to-end production solutions for our clients, such as:
Cloud-based AI systems operating on hundreds of HD video streams in realtime. Edge AI integrated into custom iOS and Android apps for realtime 30 FPS video inference. Custom data training, hyperparameter evolution, and model exportation to any destination.
For more information please visit <denchmark-link:https://www.ultralytics.com>https://www.ultralytics.com</denchmark-link> .
If you are in mainland China, you should resort to certain VPN services
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/helen12138>@helen12138</denchmark-link> weights are downloaded automatically, i.e. try running python detect.py --weights yolov5s.pt

@helen12138 weights are downloaded automatically, i.e. try running python detect.py --weights yolov5s.pt
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/glenn-jocher>@glenn-jocher</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/MagicFrogSJTU>@MagicFrogSJTU</denchmark-link> Thanks a lot! I have downloaded weights automatically , with command above.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/helen12138>@helen12138</denchmark-link> great! Where are you in the world? The automatic download function attempts two different sources, so even if the google drive folder is inaccessible the second source may work.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/glenn-jocher>@glenn-jocher</denchmark-link>
I'm in China. Thank you very much ! :)
